mapper.select: SELECT B.PROD_SUBCODE, B.PROD_COLOR||'/'||B.PROD_SIZE AS PROD_OPTION, C.PROD_PRICE, A.CART_QTY FROM CART A INNER JOIN PRODUCT B ON (A.PROD_CODE = B.PROD_CODE) INNER JOIN PRODUCT_INFO C ON (B.PROD_SUBCODE = C.PROD_SUBCODE)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_main (order_code, user_id, user_tel, order_contents, order_status, order_qty, order_amount, delivery_addr1, delivery_addr2, order_created) values (to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #{user_id}, #{user_tel}, #{order_contents}, '100', 0, 0, #{delivery_addr1}, #{delivery_addr2}, sysdate)
